headline: Union Pacific Railroad Announces Pay Raises and Labor Agreements with 11 Unions that Cover 12 Crafts
summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 03, 2025--Union Pacific is pleased to announce that it has reached ratified agreements with 11 unions that cover 12 crafts and represent 46% of the railroad’s craft employees.

raw.headline: Union Pacific Railroad Announces Pay Raises and Labor Agreements with 11 Unions that Cover 12 Crafts
raw.summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 03, 2025--Union Pacific is pleased to announce that it has reached ratified agreements with 11 unions that cover 12 crafts and represent 46% of the railroad’s craft employees.

headline: Katoen Natie Supports Union Pacific–Norfolk Southern Merger, Applauds Coast-to-Coast Rail Expansion
summary: HOUSTON, September 03, 2025--Katoen Natie (KTN), a global logistics and distribution company, today voiced strong support for the proposed merger between Union Pacific Railroad and Norfolk Southern Corporation, hailing it as a historic step forward for the nation’s supply chain. The merger would create America’s first coast-to-coast railroad, seamlessly connecting over 50,000 miles of track across 43 states and linking approximately 100 ports.

headline: Union Pacific Corporation Executives to Address Morgan Stanley’s 13th Annual Laguna Conference
summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 03, 2025--Jim Vena, chief executive officer, Jennifer Hamann, executive vice president and chief financial officer, and Eric Gehringer, executive vice president – Operations, of Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) will address Morgan Stanley’s 13th Annual Laguna Conference on Wednesday, Sept. 10, 2025, at 11:30 a.m. ET.

headline: Q2 Earnings Highs And Lows: Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP) Vs The Rest Of The Transportation and Logistics Stocks
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q2. Today, we are looking at transportation and logistics stocks, starting with Union Pacific (NYSE:UNP).
